title: PM Modi pledges to help India achieve 500 GW renewable energy target by 2030
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi highlighted India's significant progress in solar energy, noting a 32-fold increase in capacity over the past decade. He expressed confidence in achieving the 500 GW renewable energy target by 2030. Modi emphasized democratizing technology and empowering developing countries to support green energy investments.
